miniapp.name: SparkQuote
miniapp.subtitle: Tiny sparks of motivation in one tap.
miniapp.description: SparkQuote is a tiny quote generator: tap for a new line, star your favorites, and keep a pocket of words that move you.
miniapp.tagline: Tiny sparks of motivation in one tap.
